Detailed Description

The classes that affect character-level text formatting extend this class.

Most extend its subclass MetricAffectingSpan.

See also:
BackgroundColorSpan, ClickableSpan, ForegroundColorSpan, StyleSpan, SubscriptSpan, SuperscriptSpan, TypefaceSpan, RelativeSizeSpan, StrikethroughSpan, UnderlineSpan
